acceptance_criteria:

- [ ] All query results populate namespace based on read namespace
- [ ] Existing query tests updated for new field
description:
**Problem**
REALTIME_PLAN requires namespace exposure in issue summaries and issue views. API types Issue/IssueSummary lack namespace, so clients canâ€™t distinguish multi-namespace data.

**Design**
Add `namespace` field (NamespaceId or string) to Issue and IssueSummary in src/api/mod.rs. Update Issue::from_bead and IssueSummary::from_bead to take namespace context (or add new constructors) and update query executor call sites to pass the read namespace. Update IssueSummary::from_issue to copy namespace.

**Files**
- src/api/mod.rs
- src/daemon/query_executor.rs
title: Expose namespace in Issue and IssueSummary API
